title: Wavemother's Sickle
content:
Wavemother's Sickle Rare 2~5 Damage 1d4 +2 Slashing +1d4 Cold Watery Guidance: This weapon has Advantage against Wet creatures. Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The curve of this sickle evokes a pitiless crescent moon over turbulent seas. Sickle Light 0.9 190

Wavemother's Sickle

1d4 +2 Slashing +1d4 Cold

Watery Guidance: This weapon has Advantage against Wet creatures.

Weapon Enchantment +2

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The curve of this sickle
